parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Stamina System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Forces unit to walk even if run or sprint is selected.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''forceWalk''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the unit forced to walk
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Boolean]] - true/false

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[forceWalk]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isForcedWalk]], [[isWalking]], [[forceSpeed]], [[getSpeed]]
</value></part></template>
